response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its value and the benefits it provides, we're extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a savings of $1,500 compared to the standard retail price. We believe in making high-quality solutions accessible, and we're confident that you'll find this investment worthwhile. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10500}
